page.title: 19TRADE
page.content: SOMERSHAM HAS A VERY GOOD, VARIED SUPPLY OF SHOPS FOR A VILLAGE OF ITS SIZE. THE SHOPS COVER A FAIR RANGE OF LOCAL NEEDS, WITH MORE SPECIALIST UNITS SUCH AS A CHEMIST, POST OFFICE, TWO BANKS, AN INSURANCE BROKER AND PHOTOGRAPHER PROVIDING SERICES FOR A WIDER AREA. COLNE HAS ONE VILLAGE SHOP ON THE SOUTH EDGE OF THE SURVEY AREA. THREE PUBS CLUSTER AROUND THE CROSS AREA OF SOMERSHAM. ALTHOUGH MANY RESIDENTS WORK IN NEARBY TOWNS, AND WITH AGRICULTURAL WORK OFFERING FEWER OPPORTUNITIES, THERE ARE HOWEVER A NUMBER OF JOBS IN LOCAL MANUFACTURING AND COMMERCIAL CONCERNS. THESE INCLUDE FRUIT PACKING AND WHOLESALE DISTRIBUTION, LIGHT ENGINEERING, ROAD HAULAGE, A COACH COMPANY, A SPECIALIST INSULATION FIRM, A DOUBLE GLAZING FIRM, GARAGE SERVICES AND BUILDING CONTRACTORS.
